text: (Hitobito ni) itte yaru ga i. `Ten to ji kara, anata gata ni yodo o kyokyu suru no wa dare ka. Chokaku ya shikaku o tsukasadoru no wa dare ka. Mata shinda mono kara, seimei o motarashi,-sei kara shi o motarase rareru no wa dare ka. Mata subete no jibutsu o kisei togyo suru no wa daredearu no ka.' Kare-ra wa kanarazu `arra' to iou. Itte yaru ga i. `Naze anata gata wa,-nushi o osorenai no ka
